channel.title: The Journey - Podcasts
channel.description: All Podcasts are free. Simply click on the title below to listen to The Journey on your desktop or mobile device. To subscribe, search us in the iTunes Store under The Journey with Mark Stanley. Our most recent shows are listed on this page. The entire lineup of Podcasts can be viewed and enjoyed by clicking on the following link:

item.title: The Journey - Episode 61 - The Craigslist Effect
item.description:
Original Airdate 24 July 2011
As we track the pre-ordained timeline known as our Journey, changing times often require us to re-examine our techniques. This week we revisit the concept of lightening our load, in order to be ready when opportunity reveals itself.

item.title: The Journey - Episode 60 - Givers, Takers, and Scorekeepers ... Oh My !
item.description:
Original Airdate 17 April 2011
In this edition of The Journey, we place the emphasis on the advantages of everyday generosity.
item.itunes:subtitle: Original Airdate 17 April 2011 In this edition of The Journey, we place the emphasis on the advantages of everyday generosity.

item.title: The Journey - Episode 59 - The Pervasive Fear Of Success - Part 2
item.description:
Original Airdate 14 December 2010
In this installment of The Journey, a sports analogy draws our attention tot he problem of giving up too early.
item.itunes:subtitle: Original Airdate 14 December 2010 In this installment of The Journey, a sports analogy draws our attention tot he problem of giving up too early.
item.itunes:summary: Original Airdate 14 December 2010 In this installment of The Journey, a sports analogy draws our attention tot he problem of giving up too early.

item.title: The Journey - Episode 58 - The Pervasive Fear Of Success - Part 1
item.description:
Original Airdate 02 November 2010
In this Podcast we explore the factors and excuses that we allow to derail us short of owning our dreams.
item.itunes:subtitle: Original Airdate 02 November 2010 In this Podcast we explore the factors and excuses that we allow to derail us short of owning our dreams.
item.itunes:summary: Original Airdate 02 November 2010 In this Podcast we explore the factors and excuses that we allow to derail us short of owning our dreams.

item.title: The Journey - Episode 57 - Your Dream - Is It Working?
item.description:
Original Airdate 19 June 2010
Is your “Work” exclusive to your “Dream?” ... Find out today, as we give a new twist to the concept of work, along your Journey.
item.itunes:subtitle: Original Airdate 19 June 2010 Is your “Work” exclusive to your “Dream?” ... Find out today, as we give a new twist to the concept of work, along your Journey.

item.title: The Journey - Episode 56 - Stuck Behind The Nerds
item.description:
Original Airdate 09 May 2010
There’s perhaps nothing more discouraging in our work lives than being trapped “underneath” someone who just won’t let you “shine.” Well, hang in there, as we have some useful perspectives to share as we overcome those “human obstacles” we encounter, along the Journey.

item.title: The Journey - Episode 55 - The Person You Used To Be
item.description:
Original Airdate 05 April 2010
In this installment of The Journey, we explore, using two entirely different situations, the concept of change, and our reponse to it. New opportunities may be awaiting within challenging and emotional situations, and we visit both the past and the future for answers.
item.itunes:subtitle: Original Airdate 05 April 2010 In this installment of The Journey, we explore, using two entirely different situations, the concept of change, and our reponse to it. New opportunities may be awaiting within challenging and emotional situations, and we
item.itunes:summary: Original Airdate 05 April 2010 In this installment of The Journey, we explore, using two entirely different situations, the concept of change, and our reponse to it. New opportunities may be awaiting within challenging and emotional situations, and we visit both the past and the future for answers.

item.title: The Journey - Episode 54 - An Afternoon With Chris Standring - Part 3
item.description:
Original Airdate 03 March 2010
Concluding a delightful conversation with one of the leading creative artists of our time, Chris Standring, we explore the importance of character and people skills in today’s competitive market ... is it realistic to be driven? ... being accessible to your customer/fan base ... social networking trip wires ... keeping your soul in the midst of success ... and taking the chill pill. Keep the notepad loaded and the pen well-inked, as this Podcast is compulsory listening.

item.title: The Journey - Episode 53 - An Afternoon With Chris Standring - Part 2
item.description:
Original Airdate 16 February 2010
In this Podcast, we continue our exclusive interview with guitarist/composer Chris Standring. We discuss making the transition to what you really love ... networking tips and trip wires ... perception vs. reality ... leaving the familiar behind and closing the back door ... how important is my stuff? ...answering the doubters ... and being a professional vs. being a fan. We hope you enjoy these fresh new angles on life and career.
item.itunes:subtitle: Original Airdate 16 February 2010 In this Podcast, we continue our exclusive interview with guitarist/composer Chris Standring. We discuss making the transition to what you really love ... networking tips and trip wires ... perception vs. reality ...

item.title: The Journey - Episode 52 - An Afternoon With Chris Standring - Part 1
item.description:
Original Airdate 29 January 2010
Today we begin a multi-week series featuring a conversation with one of the most talented and innovative artists on the contemporary music scene. We think you’ll find guitarist Chris Standring to be entertaining, and his insights encouraging to you as you travel your Journey. In this Podcast we discuss, in a fresh new way, several issues quite familiar to the veteran listener of The Journey, including the importance of family support, the value of your Dream Team, having a plan in place, and the financial challenges of launching out to own your dream ... enjoy !
